import styles from '../App.module.css' import logo from '../Assets/logo.png' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Login = ({steps, data, handleLogin, handleChange, handleGoogleSignIn}) => { return( <>
{steps == 1 ?

Welcome Back!

:

Enter your password

}
{steps === 1 && ( <>

Don't have an account? Signup

Or

Terms of Service
Privacy Policy
)} {steps === 2 && ( <>

Or

Terms of Service
Privacy Policy
)}
) } export default Login
